hero.title: Discover the Ideal Residential Property When You Rent House in Sector 87 Gurgaon
description: Welcome to the premier destination for residential rentals Sector 87 Gurgaon offers a compelling mix of modern infrastructure and peaceful living making it an ideal choice for families and professionals alike We understand that finding the perfect home goes beyond just location it is about lifestyle and convenience.

If you are looking to rent house in Sector 87 you gain access to strategically planned residential complexes excellent connectivity via NH-48 and a burgeoning social ecosystem Explore our curated list of available rental properties including spacious builder floors independent houses and high-rise apartments tailored to meet every budget and requirement Start your effortless home search journey with us today and secure your next rental residence.

featuresSection.heading: Explore Diverse Rental Options Finding the Perfect Home When You Rent House in Sector 87
description: Sector 87 presents a vast inventory of residential rental units ensuring that every prospective tenant finds a property that matches their specific needs whether you require a compact space for a single professional or a sprawling villa for a large family The rental market here is highly dynamic offering everything from newly constructed homes to established well-maintained properties.

We specialize in simplifying the search to rent house in Sector 87 by categorizing properties based on type size and amenities provided This approach allows you to quickly filter options and focus only on the homes that truly fit your vision of ideal living Each listing is thoroughly vetted to ensure transparency and quality providing you with complete peace of mind throughout the leasing process.

features.title: Independent Floors
features.description: These properties are highly sought after by those who prioritize privacy and ample space Rent house in Sector 87 by choosing an independent floor offering dedicated entry points private terraces and often more green space than apartment complexes They are perfect for small families who desire the feel of a standalone home without the maintenance hassles of a full villa.

features.title: Builder Floor Apartments
features.description: Builder floors strike an excellent balance between spacious apartment living and independence Typically ranging from 2 BHK to 4 BHK these units feature modern fittings excellent natural light and low-density living arrangements Sector 87 boasts numerous builder floor options providing a premium rental experience at a competitive price point in Gurgaon's thriving market.

features.title: Premium Residential Apartments
features.description: For those seeking community living and comprehensive amenities premium apartments in Sector 87 are the best choice Renters benefit from integrated facilities such as power backup 24/7 security dedicated parking and access to clubhouses and swimming pools These properties are usually located within established high-rise societies.

features.title: Spacious Duplex Houses
features.description: If your family requires extra room or unique layout features a duplex house offers two levels of living space providing distinct separation between common areas and bedrooms Duplexes in Sector 87 offer the prestige and luxury of independent housing while benefiting from community oversight ideal for growing families or those who frequently host guests.

features.title: Luxury Furnished Villas
features.description: Experience unparalleled comfort and elegance by opting for a furnished villa rental in Sector 87 These luxury units feature high-end interiors top-tier appliances and often include private gardens or terrace spaces Furnished options are perfect for expatriates or corporate executives seeking immediate move-in without the burden of setting up a new home.

features.title: Affordable Studio Units
features.description: Ideal for students or young working professionals studio apartments in Sector 87 offer efficient space planning and excellent location access These compact units provide all necessary living functions within a smaller footprint ensuring lower monthly rent and utility costs They are a practical entry point into the Sector 87 rental market.

locationsSection.title: Excellent Connectivity Making Your Decision to Rent House in Sector 87 Simple
description: Sector 87 Gurgaon sits within the highly coveted New Gurgaon area known for its superior urban planning and arterial road network Connectivity is a major factor driving demand for properties here especially for those needing quick access to major business districts and commercial hubs.

When you choose to rent house in Sector 87 you benefit from immediate access to the bustling NH-48 Delhi-Jaipur Expressway which drastically cuts down commuting time to Delhi Manesar and other parts of Gurgaon Furthermore the sector’s proximity to the Dwarka Expressway promises enhanced future connectivity and easy access to the Indira Gandhi International Airport This strategic placement makes Sector 87 not just a home but a gateway to seamless city life.

whyChoose.title: Why Sector 87 is the Ultimate Destination to Rent Your Next Family House in Gurgaon
description: Making the decision to rent house in Sector 87 means investing in quality of life This locality has rapidly developed into a self-sufficient ecosystem offering residents a perfect blend of residential comfort commercial convenience and strong future growth prospects.

We highlight the key reasons why tenants prefer Sector 87 over neighboring areas focusing on safety modern amenities and the strong sense of community that makes this location truly special in the Gurgaon real estate landscape.

points.title: Strategic Location Advantage
points.description: Sector 87 is positioned ideally in New Gurgaon offering rapid transit opportunities to both commercial and institutional areas Unlike some established sectors Sector 87 boasts wide roads less traffic congestion and excellent infrastructure planning ensuring smooth daily commutes and overall better living standards for renters in Gurgaon.

points.title: Excellent Social Infrastructure
points.description: The locality is well-supported by robust social infrastructure You will find renowned schools like DPS and Suncity School and multi-specialty hospitals within a short driving distance This density of essential services ensures that all family needs from education to healthcare are met quickly and efficiently right within the vicinity of your rental home.

points.title: Modern Property Amenities
points.description: Most residential societies in Sector 87 are new or recently renovated providing tenants with access to modern amenities like advanced fire safety systems 24-hour security surveillance dedicated power backup and high-speed lifts Rent house in Sector 87 and enjoy a stress-free existence focused on comfort and convenience.

points.title: Seamless Connectivity to NH-48
points.description: The proximity to the National Highway 48 is a massive advantage for residents especially those commuting to major corporate centers in Gurugram and Delhi Easy entry and exit points ensure that travel time is minimized making the sector highly attractive for professionals seeking quick city access without living in the congested core areas.

points.title: Safety and Security Measures
points.description: Safety is a priority for every renter and Sector 87 offers high-level security measures across most complexes including gated access boom barriers and dedicated security personnel The area is known for its peaceful environment ensuring a secure and protective living space for your family and assets.

points.title: Diverse Budget Rental Options
points.description: Whether you are searching for an economical 1 BHK apartment or a high-end luxury villa Sector 87 caters to a wide financial spectrum The variety of housing types available ensures that individuals and families with varying budget constraints can find a suitable and comfortable home to rent without compromising quality.

points.title: Proximity to Educational Hubs
points.description: Families with children will appreciate the close proximity to some of Gurgaon’s best schools and coaching centers Reducing daily school commutes is a significant quality of life improvement offered by houses for rent in Sector 87 making it a practical choice for long-term residential planning.

points.title: Well-Maintained Green Spaces
points.description: Despite its rapid urbanization Sector 87 maintains several well-kept parks and green belts providing residents with recreational areas for exercise relaxation and community gatherings These green spaces enhance the aesthetic appeal and provide a healthier environment for all age groups.

faqSection.title: Important Questions Answered About Finding a Property to Rent House in Sector 87
faqSection.description: Get all the essential details about lease agreements security deposits and documentation required when searching for residential properties in this area ensuring a smooth and transparent transaction process.

faqs.question: What is the typical security deposit structure for rental homes in Sector 87
faqs.answer: The standard security deposit when you rent house in Sector 87 is typically equivalent to two months' rent This amount is held by the landlord throughout the tenancy period and is refundable upon the satisfactory handover of the property at the end of the lease less any deductions for damages or unpaid utilities Always ensure that the security deposit terms and conditions are explicitly detailed in your written rental agreement before payment.

faqs.question: Are there fully furnished houses available for rent in Sector 87 Gurgaon
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 87 has a substantial number of fully furnished rental properties catering primarily to corporate tenants and expatriates These homes come equipped with essential furniture white goods like refrigerators and washing machines and sometimes even kitchenware Fully furnished units command a premium rent but offer maximum convenience eliminating the need for upfront capital investment in home furnishings.

faqs.question: How does the lease agreement process work when I rent a house here
faqs.answer: Once a property is finalized a legally binding lease agreement is drafted outlining the terms conditions rent amount duration and responsibilities of both the tenant and the landlord This document is crucial and should be thoroughly reviewed A typical lease period for houses in Sector 87 is 11 months renewable upon mutual consent The agreement should be notarized and registered for legal validity.

faqs.question: What are the average rental rates for a 2 BHK apartment in this sector
faqs.answer: Rental rates for a 2 BHK apartment in Sector 87 can vary significantly based on the specific society age of construction and amenities offered On average you can expect rates to range between INR 15000 and INR 25000 per month for semi-furnished units Premium builder floors or apartments in luxury societies might range higher It is always recommended to compare several listings to gauge the current market price accurately.

faqs.question: Is Sector 87 safe for families and working professionals seeking rental housing
faqs.answer: Absolutely Sector 87 is considered one of the safer sectors in New Gurgaon Most residential complexes here are gated communities with multi-tiered security systems including CCTV surveillance and controlled access points The locality benefits from strong community presence and proactive management ensuring a peaceful environment suitable for both families and single working professionals who prioritize security.

faqs.question: Which areas or sub-localities within Sector 87 offer the best connectivity
faqs.answer: The properties situated closer to the main Sector 87 entry point and those adjacent to the SPR Southern Peripheral Road extension tend to offer the best immediate connectivity These areas provide quicker access to NH-48 and major commuting routes ensuring less time spent in local traffic and faster travel to office locations like Cyber City and IMT Manesar.

faqs.question: What essential documents do I need to prepare before finalizing a rental property
faqs.answer: To successfully rent house in Sector 87 tenants typically need to provide identity proof such as Aadhar Card or Passport address proof employment details or salary slips and bank statements Landlords often require copies of PAN cards and passport-size photographs Ensure you have these documents ready to expedite the background verification and lease signing process.

faqs.question: Are maintenance charges usually included in the monthly rent amount
faqs.answer: In Sector 87 rental agreements the inclusion of maintenance charges depends heavily on the type of property For high-rise apartments the society maintenance fee is often charged separately from the base rent However for independent houses or builder floors the common area maintenance is usually negligible or managed by the tenant directly Always clarify whether the stated rent is inclusive or exclusive of monthly society fees.

faqs.question: Can I find pet-friendly rental houses or apartments in Sector 87 Gurgaon
faqs.answer: While finding pet-friendly rentals can sometimes be challenging Sector 87 offers options particularly in independent floors or smaller builder floor units High-rise societies often have strict rules regarding pets It is crucial to be upfront with the landlord about pet ownership as some may require a higher security deposit or an addendum in the lease specifically addressing pet residency and liability.

faqs.question: How quickly can I move into a house after signing the lease agreement
faqs.answer: If all documentation and payments including the security deposit and first month's rent are completed the move-in process can be very fast sometimes within 24 to 48 hours for immediate possession properties Ensure that utility connections like electricity and water supply transfers are finalized before your official moving date The registration of the lease agreement might add a few days to this timeline.
